I am a full Professor of Neurology and the Vice Director of the Institute of Neurology, WHO Collaborating Center for Research and Training in Neurosciences, Fudan University, Shanghai, China. Our lab focuses on the research of Alzheimer's disease and initiates our cohort in Chinese Han population. Welcome to join us.
